entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low zero. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers or drizzle early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening. Risk of freezing rain late in the evening and overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
